javadoc.text:
* Returns the median of the available values. This is the same as the 50th percentile. * See {@link Percentile} for a description of the algorithm used. *
* Note that this implementation is not synchronized. If * multiple threads access an instance of this class concurrently, and at least * one of the threads invokes the increment() or * clear() method, it must be synchronized externally.

method.name: Median
method.comment: No try-catch or advertised exception - arg is valid

javadoc.text: * Copy constructor, creates a new {@code Median} identical * to the {@code original}
javadoc.param: original the {@code Median} instance to copy
